text: <!channel>: What sort of effort is involved with making it possible to select an image from a page when sharing on something like facebook?
specific use case — sharing (on facebook) the poster blog post that matt just put up. I want to have the ability to select one of the images from the post vs. our logo. Thoughts?

Out of the two components needed for this (CMS and Front-end) mine is pretty straightforward once I can get the image URL from the CMS. I don't how much effort would be for <@U02613K0X> to add that to the CMS.
I don't have FB, but what happens if you copy the URL for your post instead of using our share button?
yeah - that's what i was doing. No dice
not a huge deal, just typing it while i'm thinking of it
It should do the same regardless of the source.
And I know LinkedIn and possibly G+ behave in a very similar way.
i was able to select an image on linkedin
Cool. The funny thing is that it sometimes picks random images like our logo or the map from the footer. Seems to be working for this post, though.
